text: Atash Taqipour (, was born 1945 in khoy, West Azerbaijan) is an Iranian theater, cinema and TV actor. Taqipour has played in famous movies in TV and Cinema such as Shaheed-e-Kufa, Dame sobh and Mosafer. ==Notes== ==External links== * Atash Taqipour in Internet Movie Database * Atash Taqipour in Internet database of Soureh Cinema Category:Living people Category:Iranian male film actors Category:Iranian Azerbaijani actors Category:Iranian male stage actors Category:Iranian male television actors Category:People from Khoy Category:1945 births
title: Atash Taqipour
